channel.title: Pages on Adam Whitlock
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Adam Whitlock

item.title: Coffee
item.description: I’ve got a coffee hobby. It’s big enough to have its own section. Snobbery I’ve been asked if I’m a coffee snob by a lot of people. I don’t think I am. I’ll drink any cup of coffee that is put in front of me. I’ve had my fair share of vending machine coffee and even know preset codes to get what I want. My Starbucks account usually has some money in it for an emergency cup.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Adam Whitlock and do things. I’ll update this soon enough with personal details. I have a copy of my manager README on GitHub, as a starter. Site Design & Details The site is hosted on Github, using Github Pages. Website code is statically generated, meaning that all content on this site was pre-generated and not rendered. There’s only one piece of Javascript used on this site, which is meant for expanding the menu for mobile users.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to personally reach out to me, please send an email to “adam [at] adamwhitlock [dot] com”. I don’t check my email daily, unless I’m expecting something, so please wait a day or two before sending a followup message. Additionally, check out my social media profiles below. LinkedIn: /in/alloydwhitlock Github: alloydwhitlock Twitter: alloydwhitlock If this is concerning something professional, like a business opportunity, please reach out using LinkedIn.
